HOME.PRE_START: Before continuing you must click on the **{{button}}** button.
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
Start configuring Filo by selecting the category of modules you want to configure and then select the module you want to operate with.

**Do you need a reference guide? Don't worry!**
By **[clicking here]({{url}})**, you'll redirect to the Filo's Wiki, which contains information on how to configure anything.

**Too complicated?**
**[Contact us]({{url2}})** if you have any questions or require any additional clarification.

ADMINISTRATION.LABEL: Administration modules
ADMINISTRATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you in the administration of your server.

COMMUNITY.LABEL: Community modules
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you improve the experience in your community.

MODERATION.LABEL: Moderation modules
MODERATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you moderate your server.

HOME.TITLE: Filo Setup Menu

LOADING_DATA: Please wait while the necessary data is loaded.

MODULES.SELECT_A_MODULE: You must select the module from the **{{module}}** category that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_A_SUBMODULE: You must select the submodule from the **{{module}}** module that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_THE_ACTION: You must select the action you want to perform on the module.
MODULES.RESET_REQUEST_WARNING: Are you sure you want to reset the **{{module}}** module? This action can't be undone!
MODULES.MODULE_RESET: The **{{module}}** module has been reset successfully.
MODULES.SELECT_A_CHANNEL: You must select the channel you want to set.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_CHANNEL: You must select at least one channel.
MODULES.SELECT_A_ROLE: You must select the role you want to set.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_ROLE: You must select at least one role.
MODULES.CHANNEL_SET: You have successfully set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for the **{{module}}** module.

DM_STATUS.LABEL: Toggle the status of DMs
DM_STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of notifications by DM.
DM_STATUS.DM_STATUS_TOGGLED: You have successfully {{action}} the DM notifications for the **{{module}}** module.

ADD.LABEL: Add {{type}}
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have successfully added **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully added the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.

SET.LABEL: Set the {{type}}
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the {{type}} list to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED: You have successfully set **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully set the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.

REMOVE.LABEL: Remove {{type}}
REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Remove {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED: You have successfully removed **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully removed the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.NO_DATA_TO_REMOVE: There are no {{value}} available to remove from the module's exception list.

COMMANDS.LABEL: Commands
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of Filo's commands.

CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_COMMANDS: You must select the commands you want to {{action}}.
CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_CATEGORIES: You must select the categories you want to {{action}}.

DISABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Disable commands
DISABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_DISABLE: All available commands have been disabled.

ENABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Enable commands
ENABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_ENABLE: All available commands are currently enabled.

DISABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Disable categories
DISABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_DISABLE: All available categories have been disabled.

ENABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Enable categories
ENABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_ENABLE: All available categories are currently enabled.

LANGUAGE.LABEL: Language
LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Change the language of Filo on this server.
LANGUAGE.SELECT_A_LANGUAGE: You must select the language you want to set.
LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_SET: You have set the **{{language}}** language successfully.

REPORTS.LABEL: Reports
REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Provide reporting tools to your server members.

SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MEMBERS: Change the behavior of the member reporting module.
SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MESSAGES: Change the behavior of the message reporting module.

REPORTS_CHANNEL.LABEL: Set the reports channel
REPORTS_CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Set where you want the reports to be sent.

IGNORED_ROLE.LABEL: Set the ignored role
IGNORED_ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Set a role whose members can't send reports.
IGNORED_ROLE.IGNORED_ROLE_SET: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the ignored role successfully.

ADD.LABEL: Add notification roles
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have added the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as a notification role successfully.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have added **{{number}}** roles as notification roles successfully.

SET.LABEL: Set the notification roles
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
SET.COMPLETED: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the notification role successfully.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have set **{{number}}** roles as the notification roles successfully.

VIEW.TITLE: Viewing the settings of the **{{module}}** module
